title: Here's what a mid-level salary looks like at Amazon, Alphabet, Facebook, and other tech companies
text: Here's what a mid-level salary looks like at Amazon, Alphabet, Facebook, and other tech companies Jillian D'Onfro Reblog Companies in the United States are now required to reveal the ratio between their median paid employee and their CEO. It's interesting to see how median salary differs across the tech industry. For example, a middle-of-the-pack employee at Facebook makes more than 8 times Amazon's median employee salary.
